ValidationRule.description: US-0010823 - Rejection appeal process for Seller Risk Management
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF( AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Seller_Risk_Management', ISCHANGED(EBH_Stage__c), IF( $Permission.UK_Seller_Risk_Management_BU, OR(TEXT(PRIORVALUE(EBH_Stage__c)) != "Completed", TEXT(Ticket_Status__c) != 'Rejected'), true ),
ISPICKVAL(EBH_Stage__c, "Appeal"),
NOT( $Setup.ActiveValidationRules__c.All_Validation_Rules_Deactivated__c),
NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System')) ) ,true ,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only BU/Requestors can appeal when Ticket status is "Rejected"
